apihelp-query+metavars-param-continue: When more results are available, use this to continue.
apihelp-query+metavars-param-limit: The maximum number of pages to return (generator only).
apihelp-query+metavars-param-set: Only list values from these subsets. To get only the main set, use "mvsubset=|".
apihelp-query+metavars-param-var: Only list values with these names. Useful for checking whether a certain page uses a certain variable.
metatemplate-listsaved-savemarkup-overla: <savemarkup> was used in a parameter that's already flagged to always save markup. While harmless, it's probably better to remove the redundant <savemarkup>.
metatemplate-listsaved-template-missing: #listsaved error: the provided template, [[$1|{{PAGENAME:$1}}]], doesn't exist
metatemplate-listsaved-template-saveigno: Warning: #save in template [[$1|{{PAGENAME:$1}}]] was called inside a #listsaved call and was ignored.
metatemplate-listsaved-template-toolong: #listsaved error: the provided template, [[$1|{{PAGENAME:$1}}]], is longer than $2 {{PLURAL:$2:bytes|byte}}
metatemplate-listsaved-warn-extraparams: '''#listsaved call has extra parameters.''' This style is no longer supportedâ€”all data is cached automatically, so parameters that aren't part of the conditions themselves can be removed.
metatemplate-metavarsonpage-legend: List all MetaTemplate variables on a page
metatemplate-metavarsonpage-no-page: The page name provided is invalid or does not exist.
metatemplate-metavarsonpage-no-results: There are no variables saved on this page.
metatemplate-pageswithmetavar-nodata: You must specify a variable name when searching in any set.
metatemplate-pageswithmetavar-text: This page lists pages that use a particular MetaTemplate set or variable.
metatemplate-tracking-frames-desc: The page uses a function that crosses frame boundaries.
metatemplate-tracking-listsaved-extrapar: The call to #listsaved contains extra parameters that are not part of the conditions. This format is no longer supported. Use #preload or #inherit within the template itself, depending on intent.
metatemplate-tracking-savemarkup-overlap: The {{#savemarkup}} function is being used for a variable that's already being saved with savemarkup=1.
metatemplate-tracking-variables-desc: The page uses a function that alters a variable.
